note.snippet: Dve dvekānekesu nāmasmā si yo aṃyo nā hi sa naṃ smāhi sanaṃsmiṃsu

note.original: ka. 295; rū. 89, 307; nī. 607 caṃ. 2.1.81; pā. 2.3.28; 1.4.24 pañcamyavadhismā (bahūsu)

note.snippet: saṃhita sahita saññata saha sapha vāmalakkhaṇāditūrutvū
Nāgassa nāsā viya ūrū yassāti nāganāsūrū, saṃhitā sambandhā ūrū yassāti saṃhitorū, sahitā ekabaddhā ūrū yassāti sahitorū, saññatā alolā ūrū yassāti saññatorū, ūruyā
kaññe, bhoti kaññā, bhotiyo kaññāyo, bhotī kaññāyo, ‘‘uṭṭhehi puttika pabbajjā dukkarā puttika’’ iti therīpāḷi
, tasmā ge pare mahāvuttinā rassopi yujjati. Kusajātake ‘‘na me akāsi vacanaṃ, atthakāmāya puttike’’tipi
Kaññāya kataṃ, kaññāhi kataṃ. Ettha ca ghatopi yāādeso dissati. ‘‘Te ca tattha nisīditvā, tassa rukkhassa chāyayā’’
ti ca ‘‘samantā parivāriṃsu, tassa rukkhassa chāyayā’’
Sabhati, sabhāya, sabhāyaṃ, sabhāsu, parisati, parisāya, parisāyaṃ, parisāsu, tamaddasa mahābrahmā, nisinnaṃ samhi parisati, iti bhagavā tasmiṃ parisati suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ kāyaṃ vivari
Rattiṃ, tathā itthiṃ, dhenuṃ, vadhuṃ, aggiṃ, daṇḍiṃ, bhikkhuṃ, sayambhuṃ iti. Rattiyaṃ, ‘bujjhassu jinabodhiya’nti pāḷi
, rattinaṃ vā, ‘yāvanto purisassatthaṃ, guyhaṃ jānanti mantina’ntipāḷi

note.original: ka. 69; rū. 186; nī. 218, 219; rattyādīhi ṭo smino (bahūsu) ratyādīhi (katthaci)

note.snippet: , ādo, ādimhi, pādādo, pādādimhi, gāthādo, gāthādimhi-ādisaddo pana pulliṅgoyeva, rattiṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati, ādiṃ tiṭṭhatīti ādhāratthe dutiyāva, ratyo amoghā gacchanti
, na jaccā vasalo hoti, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo
, mahāvuttinā māti, pitisaddā nādīhi saddhiṃ matyā, petyāti sijjhanti, matyā ca petyā ca etaṃ jānāmimātito pititoti attho, matyā ca petyā ca kataṃ susādhu
-katanti kataṃ nāmaṃ, susādhūti atisundaraṃ. ‘Anuññāto ahaṃ matyā, sañcatto pitarā aha’nti
Itthiyaṃ passati, ettha ca yanti suttavibhattena ‘‘bujjhassu jinabodhiya’’nti
Ivaṇṇalope sandhisuttena yakāre pare tavaggassa cavaggo, yassa ca pubbarūpaṃ
ti pāḷi, nimijātake pana najjonupariyāyati, nānāpupphadumāyutāti ca najjo cānupariyātīti
, rañño mano ummādantyā niviṭṭho, ummādantyā ramitvāna, sivirājā tato siyaṃ
. Tathā yosu pokkharañño. Nādīsu pathabyā, puthabyā, pokkharaññā. Smiṃmhi pathabyā, pathabyaṃ, puthabyā, puthabyaṃ, pokkharaññā, pokkharaññaṃ, vetraññā, vetraññaṃ
gāva, gavādese kate ato yonaṃ ṭā, ṭe ca honti, usabhā rukkhā gāviyo gavā ca
. Balagavā dammagavā vā gaṅgāya pāraṃ agamiṃsu. Athāpare patāresi balagāve dammagāve
Ettha ca gāvo no paramā mittā, yāsu jāyanti osadhā
ti ca, gavā khīraṃ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṃ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍoti ca itthiyaṃ vattanti. Gāviyo gavāti ca balagavā dammagavā balagave dammagaveti
ca gāvuṃ vā te dammi gāviṃ vā te dammīti ca gavaṃva siṅgino siṅganti
ca pume bhavanti. Atittheneva gāvo patāresi, atha kho tā gāvo majjhe gaṅgāya anayabyasanaṃ āpajjiṃsū
ti ca annadā baladā cetā, vaṇṇadā sukhadā ca tā, etamatthavasaṃ ñatvā, nāssu gāvo haniṃsu teti
ca bhaddavasena itthiyaṃ atthavasena missake vattanti. Gunnaṃ ce taramānānaṃ, gavaṃ ce taramānānaṃ, ujuṃ gacchati puṅgavo, sabbā tā ujuṃ gacchantīti
, ‘‘ke gandhabbe rakkhase ca nāge, ke kimpurise cāpi mānuse. Ke paṇḍite sabbakāmadade. Dīgharattaṃ bhattā me bhavissati’’
. Natthi attakāre natthi parakāre natthi purisakāre
, eke ekatthe, same samabhāge, nahevaṃ vattabbe
, ke chave siṅgāle, ke chave pāthikaputte
Bhogavatī nāma mandire, nagare nimmite kañcanamaye
Mahāvuttinā paṭhamāyonañca kvaci ṭe hoti. Bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissanti
, kvaci yonaṃ pakati hoti, vane vāḷamigā ceva, acchakokataracchayo, bahūhi paripanthayo
Yo ve dassanti vatvāna, adāne kurute mano
, kassapassa vaco sutvā, tapo idha pakrubbati
, vacasā manasā ceva, vandā me te tathāgate
, tapasā uttamo satto, ghatena vā bhuñjassu payasā vā, vandāmi sirasā pāde
, ye etā upasevanti, chandasā vā dhanena vā
, cetaso samannāhāro, sādhu khalu payaso pānaṃ, sāvittī chandaso mukhaṃ
, etamatthaṃ cetasi sannidhāya, sirasi añjaliṃ katvā

Manodhātu, manomayaṃ, tamokhandhaṃ padālayi, tapodhano, tejodhātu, siroruhā kesā, saroruhaṃ padumaṃ, rajoharaṇaṃ vatthaṃ, ojoharaṇā sākhā, ayopatto, vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahanti, yasodharā devī, cetoyuttā dhammā, chandovicitipakaraṇaṃ, rahogato cintesi, ahorattānamaccaye
Mahāvuttinā ahamhā smiṃno ni ca u ca hoti, tadahani, tadahu. Rahamhā smiṃno o hoti, mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisīdati
Tattha kodhādiko pulliṅgo, padādiko napuṃsako. Tattha keci saddā samāsa, taddhitamajjhe odantā honti
, āpodhātu, āpomayaṃ, vāyodhātu, vāyomayaṃ, jīva tvaṃ saradosataṃ
Keci nāssa sādesaṃ labhanti, kodhasā usunā vijjhi
, padasāva agamāsi, mākāsi mukhasā pāpaṃ, saccena danto damasā upeto-damasāti indriyadamanena, suciṃ paṇītaṃ rasasā upetaṃ
Yadā pana samāsante mahāvuttinā syādīsu vibhattīsu sāgamo hoti, tadā purisādigaṇopi hoti, byāsattamanaso, abyaggamanaso
Mahāvuttinā kvaci simhi ge ca pare ntussa attaṃ hoti, ‘‘atulo nāma nāmena, paññavanto jutindharo’’ti
ca ‘‘gatimanto satimanto, dhitimanto ca yo isī’’ti
ca ‘‘cakkhumanto mahāyaso’’ti ca ‘‘tuyhaṃ pitā mahāvīra, paññavanta jutindharā’’ti
Paṭhamāyomhi kvaci ntussa ṭa hoti, vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti
, cakkhumā andhakā honti, ye itthīnaṃ vasaṃ gatā
‘Ntassa ca ṭa vaṃse’ti aṃ, sesu ntassa ṭattaṃ, yaṃ yañhi rāja bhajati, santaṃ vā yadi vā asaṃ. Sīlavantaṃ visīlaṃ vā, vasaṃ tasseva gacchati
Mahāvuttinā paṭhamāyomhi ca savibhattissa ntassa aṃ hoti, api nu tumhe ekantasukhaṃ lokaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ viharatha
, kasaṃ khettaṃ bījaṃ vapaṃ, dhanaṃ vindanti māṇavā
‘Ntassa ca ṭa vaṃse’ti aṃmhi ntassa ṭattaṃ, ‘‘sumahaṃ puraṃ, parikkhipissa’’nti
Arahā tiṭṭhati. ‘Ntassaṃ simhī’ti simhi ntassa aṃ, arahaṃ sugato loke
‘‘Sā parisā mahā hoti, sā senā dissate mahā’’ti
ca ‘‘mahā me bhayamāgata’’nti ca ‘‘bārāṇasirajjaṃ nāma mahā’’ti
ca ‘‘mahāssa honti parivārā brāhmaṇagahapatikā, mahāssa honti parivārā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo’’ti

tiṭṭhati, sampattiṃ anubhavaṃ, anubhavanto, taṇhaṃ abhibhavaṃ, abhibhavanto, dukkhaṃ paribhavaṃ, paribhavanto tiṭṭhati, bhavantā, bhavanto, he bhavanta, he bhavantā, he bhavanto, he bhava, he bhavā, he bhavaṃ. ‘‘Kacci bhavaṃ abhiramasi araññe’’ti
Bho, bhanteti dve vuddhiatthe siddhā āmantanatthe nipātā eva, tehi paraṃ ga, yonaṃ lopo, ito bho sugatiṃ gaccha
, ummujjabho puthusile, kuto nu āgacchatha bho tayo janā
, tumhākaṃ bhaddaṃ hotū’’ti atthe siddhā āmantananipātāva, ‘‘bhaddante’’ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ
, taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddante, yāvantettha samāgatā
Santasaddo pana sappurise vijjamāne samāne ca pavatto idha labbhati. Sameti asatā asaṃ
. Saṃ, santo, santā, santo, bhosanta, bhosantā, bhosa, bho sā, bho saṃ vā, bhonto santā, bhonto santo. Yaṃ yañhi rāja bhajati, santaṃ vā yadi vā asaṃ

Santehi, santebhi, sabbhi, santassa, sato, santānaṃ, sataṃ, santasmā, santamhā, santā, satā, santehi, santebhi, sabbhi, santassa, sato, santānaṃ, sataṃ, santasmiṃ, santamhi, sati, sante, santesu. Santo sappurisā loke, dūresanto pakāsenti
Khede nirodhe ca pavatto santo purisādigaṇādiko, dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ
Rājānaṃ, rājaṃ, rājāno, caturo ca mahārāje
Mahāvuttinā rājato yonaṃ ino hoti, ‘‘samantapāsādikā nāma, soḷasāsiṃsu rājino, ekūnatiṃse kappamhi, ito soḷasarājino
, tadā adāsi maṃ tāto, bimbisārassa rājino
Suttavibhattena ttapaccayamhi ittaṃ, ‘‘sakhittaṃ kareyya, sakhittaṃ na kareyyā’’ti
Sakhāro tiṭṭhanti. ‘Ghabrahmāditve’ti gassa vikappena ettaṃ, bho sakha, bho sakhā, bho sakhe, hare sakhā kissa maṃ jahāsi
Sakhe, sakhāresu, sakhesu. ‘‘Netādisā sakhā honti, labbhā me jīvato sakhā’’ti
Samāse pana sabbaṃ purisādirūpaṃ labbhati, ‘‘sabbamitto sabbasakho, pāpamitto pāpasakho’’ti
Rūpasiddhiyaṃ pana ‘‘maghava, yuvādīnamantassa ānādeso hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsū’’ti
, yonaṃ purisādividhi ca hoti, ‘‘yathā balākayonimhi, na vijjati pumo sadā
, thiyo tassa pajāyanti, na pumā jāyare kule’’ti
icchito. Aghanti dukkhaṃ pāpañca vuccati, na aghaṃ maghaṃ, sukhaṃ puññañca, magho iti purāṇaṃ nāmaṃ assa atthīti maghavāti
Muddhasadde ‘‘muddhā te phalatu sattadhā, muddhā me phalatu sattadhā’’ iccādīsu
asmasadde ‘‘taṃ te paññāya bhindāmi, āmaṃ pakkaṃva asmanā
Sā tiṭṭhati, sā tiṭṭhanti, sāno tiṭṭhanti, bho sā, bhonto sā, sāno, sānaṃ, sāne, sānā, sānehi, sānebhi, sāssa, sānaṃ, sānā, sānehi, sānebhi, sāssa, sānaṃ, sāne, sānesūti
Saddanītiyaṃ pana nā, sesu vattahinā, vattahinoti

pāḷi. Bho daḷhadhammā, bhonto daḷhadhammā, daḷhadhammāno, daḷhadhammino, daḷhadhammānaṃ, daḷhadhammāne, daḷhadhamminā, daḷhadhammehi. Sesaṃ purisasamaṃ. Evaṃ paccakkhadhammāti. Vivaṭacchadasadde pana nāmhi ittaṃ natthi, sesaṃ daḷhadhammasamaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana ‘‘daḷhadhammoti vissuto’’ti
vuttasirānehi. Sesaṃ purisasamaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana ‘‘kāpaṭiko māṇavo vuttasiro’’tipi
Rahā vuccati pāpadhammo. Rahā, rahā, rahino, rahānaṃ, rahine, rahinā, rahinehi, rahinebhi, rahassa, rahino, rahānaṃ…pe… rahāne, rahānesūti
Mahāvuttinā akatarassehipi kehici jhasaññehi yonaṃ no hoti, ‘‘cha munino agāramunino, anagāramunino, sekhamunino, asekhamunino, paccekamunino, munimunino’’ti
ca ‘‘ñāṇupapannā munino vadantī’’ti ca ‘‘ekamekāya itthiyā, aṭṭhaṭṭha patino siyu’’nti ca
Gāthāsu ‘ghabrahmāditve’ti munito gassa ettañca hoti, porohicco tavaṃ mune
Tehiyeva aṃvacanassa nañca hoti, tamāhu ekaṃ muninaṃ carantaṃ
Yo no’jja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise

note.original: vi. va. ganthārambhakathā pe. va. ganthārambhakathā
note.snippet: Samāse pana mahesi gacchati, mahesī gacchanti, mahesayo, mahesino. Aṃvacane mahesinanti sijjhati. ‘‘Saṅgāyiṃsu mahesayo
ca ‘‘na taṃ sammaggatā yaññaṃ, upayanti mahesino, etaṃ sammaggatā yaññaṃ, upayanti mahesino
, pahantā mahesino kāme, yena tiṇṇā mahesino’’ti ca ‘‘mahesiṃ vijitāvina’’nti
ca ‘‘saṅghañcāpi mahesinaṃ, kuñjaraṃva mahesinaṃ, upagantvā mahesinaṃ
Pāḷiyaṃ pana ‘‘aggi, gini, agginī’’ti tayo aggipariyāyā dissanti – ‘‘rāgaggi, dosaggi, mohaggī’’ti
ca ‘‘channā kuṭi āhito gini, vivaṭā kuṭi nibbuto gini
Micchādiṭṭhino, sammādiṭṭhino, muṭṭhassatino, upaṭṭhitassatino, asāre sāramatino
ītopi smiṃno kvaci ne hoti, mātaṅgasmiṃ yasassine
Sabbe sīhassa bhāyanti, natthi kāyasmiṃ tulyatā
kvaci nesu hoti, susukhaṃ vata jīvāma, verinesu averino
Samāsepi paṭhamāyossa nottaṃ, dutiyāyossa nottaṃ nettañca hoti. Tattha dve nottāni pākaṭāni. Nettaṃ pana vuccate, ‘‘assamaṇe samaṇamānine
, evaṃ jarā ca maccu ca, adhivattanti pāṇine’’ti
dissanti. Tattha ‘bhassaravaṇṇine’ti pabhassaravaṇṇavante. Smiṃno nette pana ‘‘mātaṅgasmiṃ yasassine’’ iccādīni
Bhonto bhikkhave, atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi ‘‘bhikkhavo’’ti

Mahāvuttinā latopi aṃvacanassa kvaci naṃ hoti, ‘‘kimatthinaṃ bhikkhunaṃ āhu, bhikkhunamāhu maggadesiṃ, bhikkhunamāhu maggajīviṃ, buddhaṃ ādiccabandhuna’’nti dissanti, tathā ‘‘roganiḍḍaṃ pabhaṅgunaṃ, bhogānañca pabhaṅgunaṃ
Naṃmhi pare ltu, pitādīnaṃ u-kāro āraṅa hoti vā. Imesaṃ mahānāma tiṇṇaṃ satthārānaṃ ekā niṭṭhā udāhu puthu niṭṭhāti
nā, smāsu satthunāti ca sumhi satthūsūti ca siddhaṃ. ‘‘Dhammarājena satthunā, pūjaṃ labbhati bhattusū’’ti
Mahāvuttinā yonaṃ ā hoti, avitakkitā gabbhamupavajanti
Amaccavācīhi kattu, khattusaddehi gassa ettaṃ, uṭṭhehi katte taramāno
Ge pare āraṅa ca hoti, pucchāma kattāra anomapañña, ‘‘kattāraṃ anomapañña’’ntipi
Aṃmhi pare pubbassaralopo ca hoti, anukampakaṃ pāṇasamampi bhattuṃ jahanti itthiyo. ‘‘So patīto pamuttena, bhattunā bhattugāravo’’ti
Pitaro, bho pita, bho pitā, bhonto pitaro. Pitaraṃ, pituṃ vā. ‘‘Mātuṃ pituñca vanditvā’’ti
Anaṇo ñātinaṃ hoti, devānaṃ pitunañca so
, mātāpitūnaṃ accayena, dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, mātāpitūsu khattiya
, dhītu, duhitusaddā pana itthiliṅgā eva, mātā, mātaro, bhoti māta, bhoti mātā, bhoti māte vā, ‘‘acchariyaṃ nandamāte, abbhutaṃ nandamāte’’ti

dissati. ‘Ghabrahmāditve’ti gassa ettaṃ. Bhotiyo mātaro, mātaraṃ, mātuṃ, mātaro, mātare, mātuyā, mātarā, mātarehi, mātarebhi, mātūhi, mātūbhi, mātu, mātussa, mātuyā. ‘‘Mātussa sarati, pitussa saratī’’ti
Anuññāto ahaṃ matyā, sañcatto pitarā ahaṃ
. Matyā ca petyā ca kataṃ susādhu
, ahañhi jānāmi janinda etaṃ, matyā ca petyā ca
Evaṃ abhibhū, parābhibhū, vessabhū, gotrabhū, vatrabhū iccādi. Sesesu pana yonaṃ no eva labbhati, cittasahabhuno dhammā
Kamma camma ghamma asma vesma addha muddha aha brahma attaātumā kammādi. Kammani, cammani. ‘‘Kiṃ chando kimadhippāyo, eko sammasi ghammanī’’ti
ca ‘‘kiṃ patthayaṃ mahābrahme, eko sammasi ghammanī’’ti
Āyusaddo pulliṅgepi vattati, ‘‘punarāyu ca me laddho
saddo parammukhe samīpavacano, sammukhe dūravacano. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘eteti cakkhupathaṃ atikkamitvā dūragate sandhāyāhā’’ti
Tattha tyasaddopi bahulaṃ dissati. Khiḍḍā paṇihitā tyāsu, rati tyāsu patiṭṭhitā, bījāni tyāsu ruhanti
Cūḷaniruttiyaṃ pana smā, smiṃnaṃ ā, ettaṃ vuttaṃ, sabbā apeti, sabbe patiṭṭhitanti. ‘‘Sabbā ca savati, sabbathā savatī’’ti ca ‘‘tyāhaṃ mante paratthaddho’’ti
ca ‘‘yāyeva kho panatthāya āgaccheyyātha, tameva atthaṃ sādhukaṃ manasi kareyyāthā’’ti ca
‘‘neva mayhaṃ ayaṃ nāgo, alaṃ dukkhāya kāyacī’’ti
Bahulādhikārā kvaci nissa ṭā, ṭepi honti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana nissa ṭā, ṭepi dissanti- ‘‘yā pubbe bodhisattānaṃ, pallaṅkavaramābhuje. Nimittāni padissanti, tāni ajja padissare
. Kiṃ māṇavassa ratanāni atthi, ye taṃ jinanto hare akkhadhutto’’ti
Ubhayaṃ kulaṃ tiṭṭhati, ubhayāni, ubhayaṃ, ubhayāni. Sabbasamaṃ. ‘‘Ekarattena ubhayo, tuvañca dhanusekha ca
Assā itthiyā kataṃ, assā, assāya deti. Saṃmhi dīgho
, assā apeti, assā, assāya dhanaṃ, āsaṃ dhanaṃ, ‘‘abhikkamo sānaṃ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo’’ti
purisassa, āsaṃ purisānaṃ. Nevāsaṃ kesā dissanti, hatthapādā ca jālino

‘‘Sa kho so kumāro vuddhimanvāyā’’ti ettha so so kumāroti, ‘ese se eke ekatthe’ti ettha eso so eko ekatthoti vattabbaṃ. Tattha pubbaṃ pubbaṃ atthapadaṃ, paraṃ paraṃ byañjanamattaṃ. ‘‘Ayaṃ so sārathi etī’’ti

Imaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayaṃ ajjhāpehi, atho enaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpehi, ime bhikkhū vinayaṃ ajjhāpehi, atho ene bhikkhū dhammaṃ ajjhāpehi, etaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayaṃ ajjhāpehiiccādinā vattabbaṃ. Tamenaṃ bhikkhave nirayapālā
Amuto yonaṃ lopo hoti. Vo, nopavādoyaṃ
Mahāvuttinā samhi mussa duttaṃ, adussa. Pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘dussa me khettapālassa, rattiṃ bhattaṃ apābhata’’nti
‘‘Ekikā sayane setu, yā te ambe avāhari
Ekacciya, ekacceyya, ekatiyasaddā kaññā, purisa, cittanayā. ‘‘Itthīpi hi ekacciyā, seyyā posa janādhipa

Katinnaṃ itthīnaṃ, katinnaṃ purisānaṃ, katinnaṃ cittānaṃ, ayaṃ nāgamo bahulaṃ na hoti, ‘katinaṃ tithīnaṃ pūraṇī katimī’ti ca dissati. ‘‘Bahūnaṃ vassasatānaṃ, bahūnaṃ vassasahassāna’’nti ca ‘‘bahūnaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ, bahūnaṃ akusaladhammāna’’nti ca ‘‘bahūnaṃ vata atthāya, uppajjiṃsu tathāgatā’’ti
samudāyāpekkhane sati ekavacanampi labbhati, ‘‘bahujanassa atthāya bahujanassa hitāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāyā’’ti
Duvinnaṃ, dvīhi, dvībhi, dvinnaṃ, duvinnaṃ, dvīsu. Mahāvuttinā sumhi duve hoti, nāgassa duvesu dantesu nimmitā
itthīnaṃ, catassannaṃ itthīnaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ itthīnaṃ, catunnaṃ itthīnaṃ, samaṇo gotamo catunnaṃ parisānaṃ sakkato hoti, catunnaṃ parisānaṃ piyo hoti manāpoti
Vacanasiliṭṭhatte pana sati visadisaliṅgavacanānampi padānaṃ aññamaññasaṃyogo hoti, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
, avijjāya sati saṅkhārā honti, saṅkhāresu sati viññāṇaṃ hoti

Gāthāsu vipallāsāpi bahulaṃ dissanti, aññe dhammāni desenti, evaṃ dhammāni sutvāna, satañca dhammāni sukittitāni sutvā, atthāni cintayitvāna, uttamatthāni tayi labhimhā, kiṃ tvaṃ atthāni jānāsi, iccheyyāmi bhante sattaputtāni, siviputtāni avhaya
Tuvaṃ buddho tuvaṃ satthā, tuvaṃ mārābhibhū muni
Mahāvuttinā yo, hisu amhassa asmādeso, yonaṃ ettañca, asmā gacchāma, asme passati, asmāhi kataṃ, asmākaṃ dīyate, asmāhi apeti, asmākaṃ dhanaṃ, asmāsu ṭhitaṃ. ‘‘Asmābhijappanti janā anekā’’ti
pāḷi-asme abhijappanti patthentīti attho. ‘‘Asmābhi pariciṇṇosi, mettacittā hi nāyakā’’ti
Sattamiyaṃ yaṃ kiccaṃ parame mitte, katamasmāsu taṃ tayā. Pattā nissaṃsayaṃ tvamhā, bhattirasmāsu yā tava
Apādādotveva? Balañca bhikkhūnamanuppadinnaṃ, tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappakaṃ
Kasmiṃ kesūti vā kattha, kutra, kva. ‘Kuva’ntipi sijjhati, ‘‘kuvaṃ sattassa kārako, kuvaṃ satto samuppanno
Namo te buddha vīra’tthu, vippamuttosi sabbadhi
Kuhiṃ gacchati, kuhaṃ gacchati. Kahaṃ ekaputtaka kahaṃ ekaputtaka
Samāne kāle sajju-‘samāne’ti vijjamāne. Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, sajju khīraṃva muccati
Sayaṃsaddamhā ‘‘kusūlo sayameva bhijjate’’ti ettha paṭhamāya. ‘‘Sayaṃ kataṃ sukhadukkha’’nti
